name: Two Blokes
description:
GAME

Two Blokes is blocky story of two beings called Hero and Antihero. They need to cooperate and think hard to solve puzzle and meet. But once they DO, the anihilate to create yet another level of puzzles!

Both Hero and Antihero have different skillset and can manipulate level in different way. In some levels, you will be tortured with not more than precise amount of resources. In other levels, you can unleash your creativity.

Special feature: Two Blokes can be played as hotseat multiplayer.

DISCLAIMER

The block detection is not perfect, so try to hit the block from more angles if needed.

THEME OF UNITED GAME JAM

Two: No need to furthur explain, explore the world of Two Blokes with two unique characters and combine their abilities to solve the puzzles.

ALL ASSETS WERE CREATED FOR THIS JAM

but Fonts from https://www.1001freefonts.com/

TEAM

Tomas Smolik: coding, game design,  level design, sound effects, 2d graphics, playtesting

Jan Vodicka: 3D graphics, art

Jan Hartman: music
